skills.skill: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Implementation

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead as a functional lead and subject matter expert on MS Dynamics 365 finance functionality (AR, AP, Cash and Bank Management, General Ledger, Budgeting, Fixed Assets, Credit and Collections, etc.)
Gather and document business requirements and use cases through a variety of techniques (e.g. work sessions, demo, and interviews)
Define and document system requirements utilizing process flows, use cases, and other methods
Be able to do all configurations in D365 for Dynamics 365 Finance modules and work with configuring multiple legal entities and inter-company transactions
Develop the required deliverables for finance and ops business processes for systemic change (functional designs, test cases, training materials, SOPs)
Train users on new software and procedures, work with PMs and follow process and project methodology, ensuring proper implementation and adoption

education_certification.credential: Relevant certification in Dynamics 365. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business or a related field
